name: FermaxDuoxMe
0:
”Alexa, open Entrance”
”Alexa, open door”
”Alexa, is My flat locked?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Use your Alexa speakers to unlock the door or activate additional functions by voice command when someone calls your Fermax DUOX PLUS video door phone.

To use this skill you need to:
- Download the “Fermax DuoxMe” app from Google Play or Apple Store.
- Register or log in.
- Link your DUOX PLUS Wi-Fi video door phone with the DuoxMe app.
- Have an Alexa speaker or smart display (Echo Dot or Show type) set up and running.
- Link your DuoxMe account with your Amazon Alexa account through the Alexa app.
- Enable doorbell detection communications on the DOORBELL device of type “doorbell found”.
- Enable “Open with voice” on lock type found devices.
 
Alexa compatible devices: VEO WIFI 4.3“ DUOX PLUS, VEO-XS WIFI 4.3” DUOX PLUS, VEO-XL WIFI DDA 7” DUOX PLUS (all DDA and non-DDA versions).
 
This way, you will only need to say “Alexa, open the door”.
